Injector/Manterror/Ramhorn:



Ramhorn came over a hill, sub-machine gun raised.  Seeing Striker, then Dark 
Mouse, then two Predacons.  As well as Suukie.  Raising his gun, he felt a 
tap on his shoulder.  Turning, a swift punch sent him crashing to the ground.

---

Manterror laughed as Injector knocked Ramhorn down.  Raising his weapons, he 
fired two ion disks at Dark Mouse from one arm, two others at Striker from 
the other.

---

Injector punched Ramhorn twice in the face.  Then the Maximal scientist got 
his feet up against the Predacon's chest.  Pushing forward hard with his 
legs, Injector went flying back, crashing into the ground.
